text: Gagandeep Singh Bedi (Hindi: गगनदीप सिंह बेदी, born 9 September 1968) is an Indian civil servant, currently serving as the Additional Chief Secretary (Rural Development and Panchayat Raj Department) to the Government of Tamil Nadu in India. He is known for his crisis management and relief work at Cuddalore during the Tsunami in December 2004, floods management in 2005 and 2015, handling of relief works consequent to the Okhi cyclone in Kanyakumari, Gaja Cyclone in Nagapattinam of 2017 and the restoration of peace in the aftermath of Thoothukudi violence in May 2018. == References == Category:1968 births Category:People from Tamil Nadu Category:Indian civil servants Category:Living people
